title: Why Foreign Investors Are Seeing Opportunity in Japan
description: After decades of deflation and stagnation, Japan is embracing reform. With households and corporations sitting on trillions in cash, inflation has forced a shift in mindset. Corporate governance changes, rising equity participation, and the emergence of private credit are reshaping how Japanese companies finance growth. We examine whether the renaissance of Japan’s capital markets can power a long-awaited economic revival. (Source: Bloomberg)
